ruling: - You activate [[Dice Re-Roll]] before you activate the effect which will let you roll a die. Then you can use the effect of [[Dice Re-Roll]] once during the turn in which you activated it. When you resolve the effect, you negate the result of a die roll and roll again.
- You can use a [[Dice Re-Roll]] to re-roll a die roll for an "Archfiend".
- You can use a [[Dice Re-Roll]] to re-roll a die roll during the Damage Step.
- If you negate [[Roulette Barrel]]'s die roll, you negate both rolls and must roll twice again.
